00002 class OsimoCache extends OsimoModule{
00003  private $memcache;
00004  protected $enabled;
00005  protected $prefix;
00006  protected $cache_addr;
00007  protected $cache_port;
00008  protected $allowed_cache;
00009  protected $cache_time;
00010  protected $debug;
00011  
00012  function OsimoCache($options=false){
00013   parent::OsimoModule();
00014   $this->defaults = array(
00015    'enabled'=>true,
00016    'prefix'=>'',
00017    'cache_addr'=>'localhost',
00018    'cache_port'=>11211,
00019    'cache_time'=>300
00020   );
00021   
00022   $this->parseOptions($options);
00023   
00024   /* Register the cache debugging defaults */
00025   get('debug')->register('OsimoCache',array(
00026    'events'=>false
00027   ));
00028   
00029   if(class_exists('Memcache')){
00030    $this->memcache = new Memcache;
00031   }
00032   else{
00033    $this->enabled = false;
00034   }
00035   
00036   $this->init();
00037  }
00038  
00039  private function init(){
00040   if($this->enabled && is_array($this->cache_addr)){
00041    foreach($this->cache_addr as $addr){
00042     $this->memcache->addServer($addr, $this->cache_port);
00043    }
00044   }
00045   elseif($this->enabled){
00046    $this->memcache->connect($this->cache_addr,$this->cache_port);
00047   }
00048   
00049   // "db_table_name" => "memcache_obj_name"
00050   $this->allowed_cache = array(
00051    "post"=>"osimo_post",
00052    "thread"=>"osimo_thread",
00053    "users"=>"osimo_users",
00054    "forum"=>"osimo_forum",
00055    "social_siggen"=>"osimo_social_siggen",
00056    "social_status_updates"=>"osimo_statuses"
00057   );
00058  }
00059  
00060  public function options($option){
00061   isset($option['name']) ? $name = $option['name'] : $name = $option[0];
00062   isset($option['value']) ? $value = $option['value'] : $value = $option[1];
00063   if(!isset($this->defaults[$name])){ return false; }
00064   
00065   $this->$name = $value;
00066   return true;
00067  }
00068  
00069  public function sqlquery($query,$expire=false){
00070   if($query==''){ return false; }
00071   
00072   /* If cache is disabled, go straight to DB */
00073   if(!$this->enabled){
00074    $db_result = $this->db_query($query,'assoc');
00075    return $db_result;
00076   }
00077   
00078   $type = $this->parseQuery($query,$sql_type);
00079   if($cache_name = $this->queryTypeAllowed($type,$sql_type)){
00080    get('debug')->debugMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Query allowed, attempting memcache");
00081    $hash = $this->getHashKey($query,$cache_name);
00082    
00083    if(is_object($this->memcache)){
00084     $result = $this->memcache->get($hash);
00085    }
00086    else{ $result = false; }
00087    
00088    if(!$result){
00089     $db_result = $this->db_query($query,'assoc');
00090     if($db_result){
00091      if(is_object($this->memcache)){
00092       $this->cache($hash,$db_result,$expire);
00093      }
00094      get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Returning SQL result");
00095      return $db_result;
00096     }
00097     else{
00098      get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"SQL query returned no results");
00099      return false;
00100     }
00101    }
00102    else{
00103     get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Returning memcache result");
00104     return $result->data;
00105    }
00106   }
00107   else{
00108    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"query not allowed, doing mysql\n");
00109    return $this->db_query($query,'assoc');
00110   }
00111  }

00113  public function getPosts($where=false,$sort=false,$limit=false){
00114   $query = "SELECT id FROM post";
00115   if($where){
00116    $query .= " WHERE $where";
00117   }
00118   if($sort){
00119    $query .= " ORDER BY $sort";
00120   }
00121   if($limit){
00122    $query .= ' LIMIT '.$limit;
00123   }
00124   
00125   $dbresult = $this->db_query($query,'assoc');
00126   if($dbresult){
00127    $posts = array();
00128    foreach($dbresult as $post){
00129     $post_id = $post['id'];
00130     if($this->enabled && is_object($this->memcache)){
00131      $tmp = $this->memcache->get($this->prefix."post_$post_id");
00132     }
00133     if($tmp){
00134      $posts[] = $tmp->data;
00135     }
00136     else{
00137      $tmp2 = $this->db_query("SELECT * FROM post WHERE id='$post_id' LIMIT 1",'assoc');
00138      if($tmp2){
00139       if(is_object($this->memcache)){
00140        $this->cache("post_$post_id",$tmp2[0]);
00141       }
00142       $posts[] = $tmp2[0];
00143      }
00144     }
00145    }
00146    
00147    if($sort){
00148     $this->orderBy($posts,$sort);
00149    }
00150    
00151    return $posts;
00152   }
00153   else{
00154    return false;
00155   }
00156  }

00158  public function updatePost($post_id,$options){
00159   global $osimo;
00160   if(!is_numeric($post_id) || !is_array($options)){ return false; }
00161   $user = $osimo->getLoggedInUser();
00162   if(!$user){ return false; }
00163   
00164   if($this->enabled && is_object($this->memcache)){
00165    $result = $this->memcache->get($this->prefix."post_$post_id");
00166   }
00167   
00168   if($result){
00169    $post = $result->data;
00170    
00171   }
00172   else{
00173    $db_query = "SELECT * FROM post WHERE id='$post_id'";
00174    if(!$osimo->userIsModerator()&&!$osimo->userIsAdmin()){
00175     $db_query .= " AND poster_id='{$user['ID']}'";
00176    }
00177    $db_query .= " LIMIT 1";
00178    $db_result = $this->db_query($db_query,'assoc');
00179    if($db_result){
00180     $post = $db_result[0];
00181    }
00182    else{
00183     return false;
00184    }
00185   }
00186   
00187   $update = "UPDATE post SET ";
00188   foreach($options as $key=>$val){
00189    $post[$key] = $val;
00190    $query_opt[] = $key."='".mysql_real_escape_string($val)."'";
00191   }
00192   $update .= implode(",",$query_opt);
00193   $update .= " WHERE id='$post_id' LIMIT 1";
00194   $db_result = $this->db_query($update);
00195   if($this->enabled && is_object($this->memcache)){
00196    $result = $this->cache("post_$post_id",$post);
00197   }
00198   
00199   return $result;
00200  }
00201  
00202  private function cache($key,$data,$expire=false){
00203   if(!is_object($this->memcache)){ return false; }
00204   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Storing item in cache: $key");
00205   $tmp = new stdClass;
00206   $tmp->data = $data;
00207   if($expire && is_numeric($expire)){
00208    $expire_time = $expire;
00209   }
00210   else{
00211    $expire_time = $this->cache_time;
00212   }
00213   
00214   if($this->memcache->set($key,$tmp,false,$expire_time)){
00215    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Item stored!");
00216    return true;
00217   }
00218   else{
00219    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Unable to store item in cache.");
00220    return false;
00221   }
00222  }
00223  
00224  private function getHashKey($query,$cache_name){
00225   $hash = $this->prefix.$cache_name ."_" . md5(trim(str_replace(array("\n","\t","\r","\0"),"",strtolower($query))));
00226   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"cache hash = $hash");
00227   return $hash;
00228  }
00229  
00230  private function parseQuery($query,&$sql_type){
00231   $query = trim(str_replace("\n"," ",$query));
00232   $sql_type = strtoupper(reset(explode(" ",$query)));
00233   if($sql_type=='SELECT'||$sql_type=='DELETE'){
00234    $temp = explode(" ",substr($query,stripos($query,"FROM")));
00235    $sql_table = $temp[1];
00236   }
00237   elseif($sql_type=='INSERT'||$sql_type=='REPLACE'){
00238    $temp = explode(" ",substr($query,stripos($query,"INTO")));
00239    $sql_table = $temp[1];
00240   }
00241   else{
00242    $temp = explode(" ",$query);
00243    $sql_table = $temp[1];
00244   }
00245   
00246   return $sql_table;
00247  }
00248  
00249  private function queryTypeAllowed($type,$sql_type){
00250   if($sql_type!='SELECT'){ return false; }
00251   if(isset($this->allowed_cache[$type])){
00252    return $this->allowed_cache[$type];
00253   }
00254   
00255   return false;
00256  }
00257  
00258  private function db_query($query,$db_return){
00259   get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',"Querying database: $query");
00260   $result = mysql_query($query);
00261   if(!$result){
00262    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',mysql_error());
00263    return false;
00264   }
00265   
00266   if($db_return == 'assoc'){
00267    if(mysql_num_rows($result) == 0){ return false; }
00268    $dbdata = array();
00269    while($data = mysql_fetch_assoc($result)){
00270     $dbdata[] = $data;
00271    }
00272    
00273    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoCache','events',print_r($dbdata,true));
00274    return $dbdata;
00275   }
00276   else{
00277    if(mysql_num_rows($result) > 0){
00278     return $result;
00279    }
00280    else{
00281     return false;
00282    }
00283   }
00284  }

00286  public function memcacheTest(){
00287   $version = $this->memcache->getVersion();
00288   echo "Server's version: ".$version."<br/>\n";
00289   
00290   $result = $this->memcache->get($this->prefix.'osimo_posts');
00291   if(!$result){
00292    $result = new stdClass;
00293   }
00294   
00295   $result->data[1234] = array("content"=>"ohai lol","post_time"=>1234567);
00296   
00297   $this->memcache->set($this->prefix.'osimo_posts', $result, false, 60) or die ("Failed to save data at the server");
00298   echo "Store data in the cache (data will expire in 10 seconds)<br/>\n";
00299   
00300   $get_result = $this->memcache->get($this->prefix.'osimo_posts');
00301   echo "Data from the cache:<br/>\n";
00302   
00303   print_r($get_result);
00304  }

00308    $serv_status = $this->memcache->getServerStatus($this->cache_addr[0],$this->cache_port);
00309   }
00310   else{
00311    $serv_status = $this->memcache->getServerStatus($this->cache_addr,$this->cache_port);
00312   }
00313   
00314   ?>
00315   <style>
00316    body{
00317     background-color: #383838;
00318    }

00353   <?
00354   echo "<h4>OsimoCache Server Status: ";
00355   if($serv_status){ echo "<span style=\"color:green\">Online :)</span>"; }
00356   else{ echo "<span style=\"color:red\">Offline :(</span>"; exit; }
00357   echo "</h4>\n";
00358   $memUsage = exec('ps -o rss,command | grep \'memcached -d\'  | awk \'{print $0}{sum+=$1} END {print "\n", sum/1024, "MB"}\'');
00359   echo "<p id='mem_usage'>memory usage for this server (if any): $memUsage</p>";
00360   $statuses = $this->memcache->getExtendedStats();
00361   foreach($statuses as $host=>$status){
00362    $uptime_hour = round($status['uptime'] / 60/60,2);
00363    echo "<p class=\"memcache_host\">server $host</p>";
00364    echo "<table id=\"memcacheinfo_table\">";
00365          echo "<tr><td>Memcache Server version:</td><td> ".$status ["version"]."</td></tr>";
00366          echo "<tr><td>Process id of this server process </td><td>".$status ["pid"]."</td></tr>";
00367          echo "<tr><td>Server uptime:</td><td>".number_format($status ["uptime"])." seconds ($uptime_hour hours)</td></tr>";
00368          echo "<tr><td>Accumulated user time for this process </td><td>".$status ["rusage_user"]." seconds</td></tr>";
00369          echo "<tr><td>Accumulated system time for this process </td><td>".$status ["rusage_system"]." seconds</td></tr>";
00370          echo "<tr><td>Total number of items stored by this server ever since it started </td><td>".number_format($status["total_items"])."</td></tr>";
00371          echo "<tr><td>Number of open connections </td><td>".$status ["curr_connections"]."</td></tr>";
00372          echo "<tr><td>Total number of connections opened since the server started running </td><td>".number_format($status["total_connections"])."</td></tr>";
00373          echo "<tr><td>Number of connection structures allocated by the server </td><td>".$status["connection_structures"]."</td></tr>";
00374          echo "<tr><td>Cumulative number of retrieval requests </td><td>".number_format($status ["cmd_get"])."</td></tr>";
00375          echo "<tr><td> Cumulative number of storage requests </td><td>".number_format($status ["cmd_set"])."</td></tr>";
00376    
00377          $percCacheHit=((real)$status ["get_hits"]/ (real)$status ["cmd_get"] *100);
00378          $percCacheHit=round($percCacheHit,3);
00379          $percCacheMiss=100-$percCacheHit;
00380    
00381          echo "<tr><td>Number of keys that have been requested and found present </td><td>".number_format($status ["get_hits"])." ($percCacheHit%)</td></tr>";
00382          echo "<tr><td>Number of items that have been requested and not found </td><td>".number_format($status ["get_misses"])." ($percCacheMiss%)</td></tr>";
00383    
00384          $MBRead= (real)$status["bytes_read"]/(1024*1024);
00385    
00386          echo "<tr><td>Total number of bytes read by this server from network </td><td>".$MBRead." Mega Bytes</td></tr>";
00387          $MBWrite=(real) $status["bytes_written"]/(1024*1024) ;
00388          echo "<tr><td>Total number of bytes sent by this server to network </td><td>".$MBWrite." Mega Bytes</td></tr>";
00389          $MBSize=(real) $status["limit_maxbytes"]/(1024*1024) ;
00390          echo "<tr><td>Number of bytes this server is allowed to use for storage.</td><td>".$MBSize." Mega Bytes</td></tr>";
00391          echo "<tr><td>Number of valid items removed from cache to free memory for new items.</td><td>".$status ["evictions"]."</td></tr>";
00392    
00393    echo "</table>";
00394   }
00395   
00396   echo "<p id=\"memcache_footer\">osimocache is powered by <a href=\"http://www.danga.com/memcached/\">memcached</a></p>";
00397  }

00399  public static function orderBy(&$ary, $clause, $ascending = true) {
00400         $clause = str_ireplace('order by', '', $clause);
00401         $clause = preg_replace('/\s+/', ' ', $clause);
00402         $keys = explode(',', $clause);
00403         $dirMap = array('desc' => 1, 'asc' => -1);
00404         $def = $ascending ? -1 : 1;
00405 
00406         $keyAry = array();
00407         $dirAry = array();
00408         foreach($keys as $key) {
00409             $key = explode(' ', trim($key));
00410             $keyAry[] = trim($key[0]);
00411             if(isset($key[1])) {
00412                 $dir = strtolower(trim($key[1]));
00413                 $dirAry[] = $dirMap[$dir] ? $dirMap[$dir] : $def;
00414             } else {
00415                 $dirAry[] = $def;
00416             }
00417         }
00418 
00419         $fnBody = '';
00420         for($i = count($keyAry) - 1; $i >= 0; $i--) {
00421             $k = $keyAry[$i];
00422             $t = $dirAry[$i];
00423             $f = -1 * $t;
00424             $aStr = '$a[\''.$k.'\']';
00425             $bStr = '$b[\''.$k.'\']';
00426             if(strpos($k, '(') !== false) {
00427                 $aStr = '$a->'.$k;
00428                 $bStr = '$b->'.$k;
00429             }
00430 
00431             if($fnBody == '') {
00432                 $fnBody .= "if({$aStr} == {$bStr}) { return 0; }\n";
00433                 $fnBody .= "return ({$aStr} < {$bStr}) ? {$t} : {$f};\n";               
00434             } else {
00435                 $fnBody = "if({$aStr} == {$bStr}) {\n" . $fnBody;
00436                 $fnBody .= "}\n";
00437                 $fnBody .= "return ({$aStr} < {$bStr}) ? {$t} : {$f};\n";
00438             }
00439         }
00440 
00441         if($fnBody) {
00442             $sortFn = create_function('$a,$b', $fnBody);
00443             usort($ary, $sortFn);       
00444         }
00445     }
00446 }
